name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Bushou Fuunroku / 信長の野望･武将風雲録
description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Bushou Fuunroku" is the 4th in this orthodox simulation game series, released in 1990. The theme is "Culture&Technology." Tea ceremonies and the gathering of tea items add a cultural element, while the creation of guns and plated ships express the technology of the time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: 44KHz/16bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: 44KHz/16bit
